title: Microwave-assisted synthesis of ZnO structures for effective degradation of methylene blue dye under solar light illumination
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16293-16299
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02451F, Paper

Kuralay Rustembekkyzy, Madi Sabyr, Yerkanat N. Kanafin, Laura Khamkhash, Timur Sh. Atabaev
A one-step microwave synthesis process was employed to generate highly effective ZnO photocatalysts for solar light-induced quick dye degradation.
